title: Wireless Bluetooth Triage Engineer
summary: Join us in the Core Bluetooth Software Engineering team and develop cutting-edge products and technologies as a Wireless Bluetooth Triage Engineer.
description: You will be challenged with a constantly evolving and expanding set of problems, identifying their priority and severity, and driving their resolutions along with other team members in Software Engineering to deliver new features and the next generation of Bluetooth products!
key_qualifications:
- Strong understanding of wireless protocols, ideally Bluetooth
- C, C++, Objective-C, Python and/or other automation language experience
- Skilled at assessing large numbers of tasks and software bugs to determine priority and severity
- Passion for the customer experience, and obsessive about details
- Strong cross-functional communication and relationship-building skills, both internal and with external vendors
- Constantly seek to improve and automate workflows to deal with an ever-expanding slate of products and features
education_experience: Bachelors Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or equivalent experience.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role is between $135,400 and $250,600, and is determined based on skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Employees also have opportunities for stock programs, benefits like medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and services, tuition reimbursement, discretionary bonuses, and relocation assistance. Apple is committed to inclusion and diversity, providing equal opportunities without regard to various characteristics.
